channel.title: Bored
channel.description:
I got bored so why not make a pointless topic about chatting with some live support people. I just like messing with these ppl, make their job harder..I don't buy gold, im too poor.
Mary: Welcome to our online customer support. I will be happy to answer any questions you have. We can chat online or you can call me at 1-877-870-4019 (US Toll Free) or at 44-207-019-6125 (UK, International) Mary: Hello how may I assist you today? 1: I got banned after i bought gold from u Mary: May I have your item number or the in-game character name please? 1: why does that matter 1: .. Mary: Because it is blic Mary: it is blizzard 1: blic? 1: this is rs not wow. 1: dumarz Please wait while I transfer the chat to 'Nancy'. You are now chatting with 'Nancy' 1: hello Nancy: Can you tell me your paypal email address ? 1: WHAT DOES THAT MATTER! 1: this is a complaint, not a order. Nancy: We need to find your order right ? 1: no 1: I got banned after i bought gold from u 1: so im complaining Nancy: It is not our fault 1: yes. Nancy: Not we closed your account 1: so you don't care that ppl won't come back to buy gp from u 1: because u get us banned?
I have some funny convo's ill post later..

item.title: Bored
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

that particular site was probably something like www.vir4s.com (lots of types of game gold and a live chat feature)

But also i think the one that you were talking about io9 was www.chacha.com where you have to make guides find you stuff (e.g. like google but lazier)

Read full topic

item.title: Bored
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

I got bored so why not make a pointless topic about chatting with some live support people. I just like messing with these ppl, make their job harder…I don’t buy gold, im too poor.

Mary: Welcome to our online customer support. I will be happy to answer any questions you have. We can chat online or you can call me at 1-877-870-4019 (US Toll Free) or at 44-207-019-6125 (UK, International)

Mary: Hello how may I assist you today?

1: I got banned after i bought gold from u

Mary: May I have your item number or the in-game character name please?

1: why does that matter

1: …

Mary: Because it is blic

Mary: it is blizzard

1: blic?

1: this is rs not wow.

1: dumarz

Please wait while I transfer the chat to ‘Nancy’.

You are now chatting with ‘Nancy’

1: hello

Nancy: Can you tell me your paypal email address ?

1: WHAT DOES THAT MATTER!

1: this is a complaint, not a order.

Nancy: We need to find your order right ?

1: no

1: I got banned after i bought gold from u

1: so im complaining

Nancy: It is not our fault

1: yes.

Nancy: Not we closed your account

1: so you don’t care that ppl won’t come back to buy gp from u

1: because u get us banned?

I have some funny convo’s ill post later…

Read full topic
